lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi will play for Argentina at the Beijing Olympics instead of Barcelona in Champions League qualifying. Messi, who turns 21 next month, told the Spanish sports daily Marca, “It is my decision, and the Olympic Games is something which I will never get the chance to play in again,” he said. He added that he had yet to speak to Barcelona about the decision, but the team cannot prevent Messi from playing in the Games because he is younger than 23. FIFA, the world governing body, considers the Olympics an under-23 championship.
